    MHC Asia Group Vacancies Claims Administrator

    October 29, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    MHC Asia Group is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Claims Administrator position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    We are a health tech company with a vision of changing the healthcare landscape to make healthcare more affordable and provide means for a better health for our customers. We are looking for focused individuals to help the claims team achieve its customer driven SLAs.
    Responsibilities:
    As a Claims Administrator, you will assist the claims team with administrative work of claims. Emphasis is on documents handling, billing, and payment to client. You are responsible for:
    • Assist in CPF reimbursement file and payment reconciliation (Giro, Cheque)
    • Securely handling claims documents (softcopies and hardcopies) as per claims and PDPA workflow
    • Scanning and registering claims in system
    • Ability to triage claims upon registering by identifying outstanding claims documents
    • Ability to ensure all queries are responded in a timely manner especially from Contact Centre and clients
    • Maintain the records, reports, and file. Mandatory to ensure trackers are updated in a timely manner
    • Other ad-hoc duties as assigned
    Requirements/Qualification
    • Diploma / Degree in any field preferred but not mandatory
    • Minimum 2 - 4 years’ experience either in Employee Benefit handling claims documents and non-panel claims adjudication
    • Knowledgeable in handling CPF reimbursement file is an added advantage
    • Meticulous and able to multitask
    • Computer literate (Mandatory intermediate level of Microsoft Office)
    • Self-motivated individual with strong sense of responsibility
    • Resourceful with strong problem-solving skill
    • Good team player and service-oriented

    Company Overview

    MHC Asia Group is a leading health technology company with a network of over 880 in Malaysia,1200 panel clinics in Singapore with foot prints in Indonesia, the Philippines and Hong Kong.
    Majority of insurers and thousands of corporate clients adopt MHC’s web-based system to help manage their healthcare costs and profile the health of its members and workforce.
    MHC simplifies healthcare and connect stakeholders in the healthcare delivery chain with effective use of information technology and big data analytics — increasing efficiency, ensuring transparency, lowering costs and boosting productivity.
    Visit us at:
    www.mhcasia.com/managedcare
    www.mhcasia.com/health_screening
    www.facebook.com/mhcasia
    www.youtube.com/mhcasia

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Johor Bahru.
